summary: Add new female follower to the game. [HDT Required]
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3][size=4]Tanya[/size] Follower CBBE HDT

Add a unique unarmed combat fighting style follower to the game.

Backstory
Ones a proud strong warriorÂ [font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]from the arena in morrowind[/size][/font] that can even "punch a mammoth to death", after
hearing the news that her homeland are at civil war she decide to come back
to skyrim only to be caught up by imperial and prison in helgen only a day before the dragon attack.
Then it happen the destruction of helgen when she found the way to escape and headed to nearest village, Riverwood.
Without any money the only thing that remains she had is her fist which is the strongest weapon of them all..

Name: Tanya
Class: Unarmed
Level Base: Lv15
Body Type: CBBE HDT
Skill: Heavy & Light Armor
Extra: Carry Weight & marriageable

Location:
Sleeping Giant Inn

Required :
Skyrim.esm
HDT

[b][u]> > Required for HDT < <[/u][/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS by [b]xp32[/b][/size][/font][/url]

[size=3][b]Installation : [/b]
NMM or copy to data folder

[b]Uninstall : [/b]
Remove from NMM or Delete from data folder[/size]
